name: Stranded (itch) (Lavados28)
description:
Stranded is a 3D Walking simulator following the story of the little girl Rue, who stranded on an island inhabited by frogs after a storm. Help her fix a boat to get back home.

Controls

Move: WASD or left stick

Interact: E or south/east button

Pause: Esc or start

Credits

Music by Deliciouzlp

SFX made with sounds from WeLoveIndies
